name: All American Voyager 18
short: Compact travel trailer with smart layout
description: The All American Voyager 18 is a lightweight travel trailer optimized for couples and small families. It features an efficient kitchenette, wet bath, and convertible dinette.

name: Patriot Pop 220
description: The Patriot Pop 220 is an easy-tow pop-up that expands into a comfortable sleeping area and has a simple galley for weekend trips.

name: All American X-Road 40
short: Rugged off-road camper for serious adventurers
description: Built for off-grid travel, the X-Road 40 includes reinforced suspension, solar prewire, and water storage for extended stays.
